events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not as described, and I would like to request a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords relating to money back and dissatisfaction.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please confirm the order number and provide photos of the product you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Thank you, Sarah. My order number is 789456123, and I have attached photos showing the product does not match the description on your website.
We have reviewed your photos and confirmed the issue. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for your prompt response and for resolving this issue quickly.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please check your payment account in a few days to confirm the refund.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case resolution.
Yes, I received the refund and everything is perfect now. Thank you again for your assistance.
Thank you for confirming. We are closing this case now. Have a great day!
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with the support experience.
I completed the survey and gave a high rating because the service was very helpful and timely.
This case has been archived as all customer issues have been resolved and no further action is required.
